title: Infect
desc: Infect everything in a circle, can use once per day

title: Sneeze
desc: Infected human will create an area that will infect others

title: Touch
desc: Infected ones will infect next 3 uninfected ones they touch

title: Infect Bin
desc: Infect garbage bins in a circle

title: Explode Bin
desc: infect a big area around a garbage bin

title: Explode Human
desc: infect a small area around an infected human

title: Explode Animal
desc: infect a small area around an infected human

title: Summon Mushroom
desc: if there are human, animal and bin in an area, summon mushroom

title: Teleport
desc: teleport a random infected human to an area

title: Attract
desc: animals in an area would attract not infected human
